name: Sange
lore: Sange is an unusually accurate weapon, seeking weak points automatically.

descriptions.name: Lesser Maim
descriptions.description: Each attack has a 30% chance to reduce enemy hero movement speed by -20% and attack speed by -20 when used by a melee hero. Reduces enemy hero movement by -10% and attack speed by -10 when used by a ranged hero. Effect lasts 5.0 seconds.
